text:
<speak>The store is located at $session.params.pcStoreAddress. If you're having trouble finding it, it is best to call them directly at <say-as interpret-as="telephone">$session.params.pcStorePhoneNumber</say-as>. </speak>
<speak>You can say, Repeat it, or, I already called them. For help with something else, say, Main Menu.</speak>

<speak>I didn't hear you. The store is located at $session.params.pcStoreAddress. If you're having trouble finding it, it is best to call them directly at <say-as interpret-as="telephone">$session.params.pcStorePhoneNumber</say-as>. </speak>
<speak>To hear the store's location and phone number again, press 1. If you already tried to call them, press 2. Or, to get help with something else, press 3.</speak>
<speak>I am having trouble hearing you.</speak>

<speak>I didn't get that.</speak>
<speak>You can say, Repeat it, or, I already called them. Or, for help with something else, say, Main Menu.</speak>

<speak>I'm having trouble understanding you. To hear the store's location and phone number again, press 1. If you already tried to call them, press 2. Or, to get help with something else, press 3.</speak>
<speak><break time="10ms"/></speak>

<speak>The store is located at $session.params.pcStoreAddress. If you're having trouble finding it, it is best to call them directly at <say-as interpret-as="telephone"> $session.params.pcStorePhoneNumber </say-as>. Or you can say, I already called them.</speak>
<speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>

<speak>The store is located at $session.params.pcStoreAddress. If you're having trouble finding it, it is best to call them directly at <say-as interpret-as="telephone"> $session.params.pcStorePhoneNumber </say-as>. Or you can say, I already called them.</speak>
<speak>Is there anything else I can help you with today? Or, if you're done, you can hang up.</speak>
<speak>Okay, help with the store address.</speak>
<speak>Sure, main menu.</speak> <speak>In your own words, please tell me what you are calling about. For example, you can say, i picked up the wrong order, or, customer changed the address.</speak>
<speak>Okay, help with the store address.</speak>
<speak>Sure, main menu.</speak> <speak>In your own words, please tell me what you are calling about. For example, you can say, i picked up the wrong order, or, customer changed the address.</speak>

<speak>The store is located at $session.params.pcStoreAddress. If you're having trouble finding it, it is best to call them directly at <say-as interpret-as="telephone">$session.params.pcStorePhoneNumber</say-as>. </speak>
<speak>You can say, Repeat it, or, I already called them. For help with something else, say, Main Menu.</speak>

<speak>I didn't hear you. The store is located at $session.params.pcStoreAddress. If you're having trouble finding it, it is best to call them directly at <say-as interpret-as="telephone">$session.params.pcStorePhoneNumber</say-as>. </speak>
<speak>To hear the store's location and phone number again, press 1. If you already tried to call them, press 2. Or, to get help with something else, press 3.</speak>
<speak>I am having trouble hearing you.</speak>

<speak>I didn't get that.</speak>
<speak>You can say, Repeat it, or, I already called them. Or, for help with something else, say, Main Menu.</speak>

<speak>I'm having trouble understanding you. To hear the store's location and phone number again, press 1. If you already tried to call them, press 2. Or, to get help with something else, press 3.</speak>
<speak><break time="10ms"/></speak>
